data.trans_hint: Họ đã không dự tính tới việc thời tiết thay đổi đột ngột thế này.
data.en_hint: They hadn't bargained on this sudden change in the weather.
data.content_game_1: They hadn't bargained on this sudden change in the weather.
data.answer_en_hint: They hadn't bargained on this sudden change in the weather.

data.trans: Suy nghĩ trước, lên kế hoạch trước
data.trans_hint: Nó cần phải suy nghĩ trước vào một ngày đặc biệt.
data.en_hint: It needs to think ahead on a special day.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy nhanh chóng rửa mặt và đi đến trường.
data.en_hint: He washes up very fast and get to school.
data.content_game_1: He washes up very fast and get to school.
data.answer_en_hint: He washes up very fast and get to school.

data.trans_hint: Tôi chẳng muốn gì ngoài việc tụ tập bạn bè của tôi và tám chuyện với họ vào cuối tuần.
data.en_hint: I would want nothing but gather with my friends and chat away with them at the weekend.
data.content_game_1: I would want nothing but gather with my friends and chat away with them at the weekend.
data.answer_en_hint: I would want nothing but gather with my friends and chat away with them at the weekend.

data.trans: Không kịp tiến độ, chậm tiến độ
data.trans_hint: Chi nhánh mà chúng tôi thuê đã không kịp tiến độ mà chúng tôi giao cho họ, vì vậy bây giờ chúng tôi phải điều chỉnh lại toàn bộ quy trình.
data.en_hint: The agency that we hired got behind with the work we gave them, so now we have to adjust the whole process.

data.answer_en_hint: The agency that we hired got behind with the work we gave them, so now we have to adjust the whole process.

data.trans_hint: Chúng tôi có chút không may ngày hôm nay. Tất cả các bàn đều đã được đặt trước mặc dù nhà hàng này chưa bao giờ đông khách.
data.en_hint: We had a bit of hard luck today. All of the tables were booked despite this restaurant is never busy.
data.content_game_1: We had a bit of hard luck today. All of the tables were booked despite this restaurant is never busy.
data.answer_en_hint: We had a bit of hard luck today. All of the tables were booked despite this restaurant is never busy.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đang làm việc khi Jack ghé qua và rủ tôi ăn trưa.
data.en_hint: I was working when Jack popped over and asked me out for lunch.
data.content_game_1: I was working when Jack popped over and asked me out for lunch.
data.answer_en_hint: I was working when Jack popped over and asked me out for lunch.

data.trans: Làm việc tất bật, hối hả
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã phải cực kỳ tất bật vì chỉ còn một giờ nữa là tôi bay và tôi chưa chuẩn bị hành lý cũng như chưa hoàn thành công việc của mình.
data.en_hint: I had to rush about since my flight was in an hour and I had neither packed my bag nor finished my work.
data.content_game_1: I had to rush about since my flight was in an hour and I had neither packed my bag nor finished my work.
data.answer_en_hint: I had to rush about since my flight was in an hour and I had neither packed my bag nor finished my work.

data.trans_hint: 50 người chúng tôi phải chen chúc trong một căn phòng rộng hai mươi mét vuông cực kỳ ngột ngạt
data.en_hint: 50 people of us had to squeezed into a twenty-square-meter room, which was suffocating.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã phải gấp rút chuẩn bị cho bữa tiệc trong khi chồng tôi thì đứng không và tám chuyện với bạn bè anh ấy.
data.en_hint: I was rushing around to set the party up while my husband was standing around and chatting away with his friends.

data.answer_en_hint: I was rushing around to set the party up while my husband was standing around and chatting away with his friends.

data.trans: Dọn dẹp mọi thứ về chỗ cũ
data.trans_hint: Ở Việt Nam, thường là phụ nữ dọn dẹp mọi thứ sau bữa tiệc chứ không phải đàn ông.
data.en_hint: In Vietnam, it is common to see women tidying everything away after a feast, not men.
data.content_game_1: In Vietnam, it is common to see women tidying everything away after a feast, not men.
